title: tokencreate
description: Create a new custom token or NFT. Returns the resulting TxPoW.

response.description: Full TxPoW object (same structure as send response)

txpowid.description: Transaction ID for the token creation (0x-prefixed)

x-parameters.name: Token name (string or JSON object with name/url/description/ticker). REQUIRED.

x-agent-warnings: Token creation is a TRANSACTION â€” requires Minima balance to pay for it
Set decimals:0 to create an NFT (non-fungible, indivisible token)
name can be a JSON object: {"name":"MyToken","url":"...","description":"...","ticker":"TKR"}
The created token's tokenid will appear in the outputs of the response
